categories: Category:Military officers of the Sith Empire

nodes.text: Namada was a Human male sergeant in the Imperial Army of the reconstituted Sith Empire who was part of the Special Tactics Group 41-Delta, also known as Bughunter Division. The unit was dispatched against hostiles insectoids on planets such as Balmorra and Alderaan, where they battled Colicoids and Killiks respectively.
